clusters.title: Hospitals warned end-of-life care crisis threatening treatment
clusters.neutral_headline: Hospitals warned end-of-life care crisis threatening treatment

items.title: Hospitals warned end-of-life care crisis threatening treatment
items.standfirst: A rising number of patients in hospitals could affect the level of treatment carried out this winter, a group of regional NHS leaders have been told.
items.content: A rising number of patients in hospitals could affect the level of treatment carried out this winter, a group of regional NHS leaders have been told.

clusters.title: Tackling the gender gap in CPR treatment
clusters.neutral_headline: Tackling the gender gap in CPR treatment

items.title: Tackling the gender gap in CPR treatment
items.standfirst: Research shows women are 27% less likely than men to receive CPR from bystanders.
items.content: Research shows women are 27% less likely than men to receive CPR from bystanders.

clusters.title: Why 2026 looks bright for Northern Light sightings
clusters.neutral_headline: Why 2026 looks bright for Northern Light sightings

items.title: Why 2026 looks bright for Northern Light sightings
items.standfirst: With the Sun still in an active phase there could be more spectacular Northern light displays in the year ahead.
items.content: With the Sun still in an active phase there could be more spectacular Northern light displays in the year ahead.
